title: [Bug] clicking any forum links to the community beta site, leads to a blank page.
body:
This is an odd bug but it appears that if you aren't logged into your forum account and try to enter a comment thread, it will not load the page and leaves it as a blank white page. 

I trying to read the latest red posts. I was able to bring up the community beta forum and then entered the red post tracker and see the list. But when I clicked the link for any post that was in the community beta forums it wouldn't load the page. Any link to a post to the normal forums would load properly however. I tried to go the the main community front page and was able to load the listing of threads as normal(http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/) but trying to click any of the thread links would again lead to a blank page(for example this page http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/c/fancreations/cdou5OQE-claire-the-might-of-justice will not load). I eventually tried to log in and this seemed to bypass the problem.

I'm using Chrome browser Version 34.0.1847.116 m.

replies.body: This is due to a change we pushed recently that is not backwards compatible with older versions of our javascript files. If you clear your browser cache, it should be resolved. Sorry about that!!
Didn't resolve it for me. Had to login to be able to open most threads.
am Using chrome as well, luckily I still had foxfire installed or I would never have been able to read you solution D: and it works, thanks a lot :)
I just tried this on 2 other computers and for whatever reason they appear to be working fine. Perhaps one of my chrome extensions is interfering?

I've had this problem consistently on slower internet connections and anytime the connection is interrupted. Can't say it's the reason your looking for but as is the nature with these problems I hope that may help.

Does it work on other browsers on the problem comp?
